oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Foy Willing And The Riders Of The Purple Sage - Unknown episode no. - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage radio program, unknown episode number, part 1. Featuring Foy Willing (host), and possibly Al Sloey (unconfirmed) in the dramatized story. Information crossed out on the sleeve (not necessarily pertaining to this disc) indicate a date of 1948-02-27 and the client as being Teleways.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: False start -- Theme -- Opening statement (Foy Willing) -- A Cowboy Has To Sing -- Foy Willing talks -- Hang Your Head In Shame -- Foy Willing talks -- Trail To California -- Foy Willing introduces the story -- Dramatized story [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Foy Willing and the Riders of the Purple Sage (Radio program); Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage
